body:
### Abstract


### Visualizations
For InfoVis part of the course project we chose a huge dataset that gathers tourism-related data from all around the world ([here]( https://knoema.com/WTODB2016/world-tourism-organization-database-2016) you can find the source). We made the following two visualizations on top of that:  
1. [vis1]( )  
2. [vis2]( )

### Authors
This project has been developed by Giacomo Lanciano (@giacomolanciano) and Davide Mazza (@davidemazza).
